name: Kalma (Akselmo / Skale Games)
description:
You're a mythical Finnish warrior, descending to the depths of the crypts to show Kalman Väki who's the boss. Swing that axe at the ghosts of Kalma.

You advance to next level when you have cleaned the dungeon from all enemies.

5 levels of dungeon crawling sweetness!

Sorry for no web build, Raylib-CS did not support that yet.

CONTROLS:

WASD : Move up, down, left, right

Q and E: Rotate left and right

Spacebar: Attack or advance in menus

Full source code here: https://codeberg.org/akselmo/Kalma

Honestly the code might be scarier than the game.
